# Ling Design System

> Enterprise UI Component Library based on React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Project Context
- **Framework**: React 18+
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS v3 (Utility-first) + CSS Modules (internal)
- **Architecture**: Monorepo (Turbo)
- **Distribution**: NPM (@ling-design/core) + Source Copy (Business Components)
